tool_description: Maxihost's public API enables developers to deploy and manage fully automated bare metal instances in a public cloud for physical servers.
name: Maxihost
title: Maxihost

api_list.name: ShowUser
ListAvailableServers
ShowSSHKey
ShowDeviceBandwidth

optional_parameters.name: period
optional_parameters.description: Period to fetch the bandwidth graph. Available: `custom`, `week`,`month`,`yesterday`,`current`,`previous`

optional_parameters.name: start_time
optional_parameters.description: Only used if period is `custom`. Timestamp of initial graph date.

optional_parameters.name: end_time
optional_parameters.description: Only used if period is `custom`. Timestamp of end graph date.

api_list.name: ShowDevice
ListDataCenters
ListDeviceIPs
ListAvailableBareMetalAddons
ListSSHKeys
ListUsers

optional_parameters.name: status
optional_parameters.description: An integer value to show user current status

api_list.name: ListOperatingSystems
ListDevices
